Content:
Makes all necrofire surfaces/clouds and related effects purple.
If the OsiTools v36 or higher is present, necrofire-related skills will use the new purple effects in a compatible way (works with overhauls).
If LeaderLib and OsiTools v36 or higher is present, new icons will be used for necrofire statuses and skills.
Fire a <font color='#7f5cff'>cursed flame</font> which will fork on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and leaving a <font color='#7f5cff'>cursed fire surface</font> in its wake.

Send a cursed flame that will split on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and Scorching hit enemies.

Leaves a Necrofire surface behind.

Apply Epidemic of Fire to a target character for 2 turns, which instantly deals [1], and deals this damage again at the start of each of its turns to all characters within 3m of it.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): Epidemic of Fire status' damage applies up to Weakened II and Terrified II for 1 turn. +1 turn duration.
3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Epidemic of Fire status spreads to characters within 3m.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Hurl a cursed orb of necrofire at a target, dealing [1].
Leaves behind a cursed fire surface at the point of impact.

Hurl a cursed orb of necrofire at a target, dealing [1] and applying Scorch to all enemies.
Leaves behind a cursed fire surface at the point of impact.
Changes an Incarnate's element to <font color='#7f5cff'>Necrofire</font>, unlocking <font color='#7f5cff'>Cursed Fireball</font> and <font color='#7f5cff'>Epidemic Of Fire</font>.
